work_areas.title: Program Framing and Architecture
work_areas.description: Define migration scope, constraints, and success criteria.

work_areas.title: Codex Governance and Agent Contract
work_areas.description: Create Codex-native operating rules, command mappings, and handoff process.

work_areas.title: Core Product Refactor
work_areas.description: Make UX and command entry points assistant-neutral or Codex-first.

work_areas.title: Documentation and Prompt Migration
work_areas.description: Replace Claude-specific prompts/docs with Codex-compatible guidance.

work_areas.title: Quality and Reliability Engineering
work_areas.description: Fix test harness, expand automated tests, and prevent regressions.

work_areas.title: Dashboard and API Alignment
work_areas.description: Align server and web dashboard workflows with Codex migration.

work_areas.title: CI, Packaging, and Release Readiness
work_areas.description: Stabilize pipelines and prepare migration deliverables.

work_areas.title: Rollout, Adoption, and Closeout
work_areas.description: Run pilot rollout, collect evidence, and complete handoff.

work_areas.title: Codex Skills Platform and Automation
work_areas.description: Build and operationalize reusable Codex skills for WBS/packet governance, quality, security, and drift control.

work_areas.title: Substrate Template Productization
work_areas.description: Harden the repository as a reusable Codex agent scaffold template with configurable bootstrap, validation, and packaging.

work_areas.title: Platform Hardening and Governance Separation
work_areas.description: Harden platform architecture with governance/execution separation, state migration, supervisory authority, sandboxed skills, schema authority, and deterministic verification.

wbs_level_3.title: Add compatibility notice for Claude users
Harden CLI ergonomics for Substrate workflows
Repair PLAYBOOK for JSON state model
Update team patterns and execution checklists
Fix smoke test harness false-fail bug
Add CLI unit tests for command contract
Add docs lint check for disallowed slash commands
Update CI matrix and test stages
Pilot in a real project branch
Create skills roadmap and acceptance criteria
Define shared SKILL.md template and contracts
Validate agent-eval in CI and documentation
Validate security-gates in CI and documentation
Validate pr-review-automation in CI and documentation
Validate precommit-governance locally and in CI
Validate ui-regression in CI and documentation
Validate skill-authoring by generating sample skill
Run end-to-end skills integration and readiness closeout
Implement skills manifest for optional modules
Add minimal and full WBS templates
Extend wizard for Substrate template onboarding
Define target hardening architecture and ADR baseline
Create governance engine interface contract (governance to execution)
Extract governance logic from CLI into platform governance module
Refactor CLI and execution adapter to call governance interface only
Add governance engine unit and integration test suite
Add state version metadata and compatibility contract
Implement state migration framework and migration runner
Deliver migration scripts for current schema baseline
Add backward and forward compatibility tests for state loading
Define supervisor authority model and transition policy
Implement supervisor interface and decision hooks
Enforce supervisor approval on packet transitions
Add supervisor enforcement and audit tests
Add sandbox abstraction (subprocess first, container-ready interface)
Add execution permission model (filesystem and command policy)
Add sandbox isolation and policy enforcement tests
Add schema version validation and registration workflow
Enforce schema contracts at load, init, and runtime boundaries
Implement reproducibility validator (execution, state, artifact checks)
Publish migration guide, rollout plan, and hardening closeout report
